courses.name: Resume Building Masterclass
courses.description: Learn how to craft a resume that stands out to recruiters and passes ATS systems. This course covers formatting, content optimization, and tailoring your resume for specific job applications.

courses.name: Technical Interview Prep
courses.description: Comprehensive preparation for technical interviews, covering data structures, algorithms, system design, and behavioral questions. Includes mock interviews and personalized feedback.

courses.name: Networking for Job Seekers
courses.description: Master the art of professional networking both online and in-person. Learn how to leverage LinkedIn, industry events, and informational interviews to uncover hidden job opportunities.
